name: Ext_R5_DocumentReference_basedOn
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.DocumentReference.basedOn for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents DocumentReference.basedOn from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DocumentReference|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Procedure that caused this media to be created
element.definition: A procedure that is fulfilled in whole or in part by the creation of this media.
element.comment: `DocumentReference.basedOn` has no related element in R4B:DocumentReference `DocumentReference.basedOn` maps to R4B `Media.basedOn`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Appointment)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/AppointmentResponse)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Claim)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CommunicationRequest)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Contract)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CoverageEligibilityRequest)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DeviceRequest)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/EnrollmentRequest)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ImmunizationRecommendation)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationRequest)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/NutritionOrder)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/RequestOrchestration)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SupplyRequest)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/VisionPrescription)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
